timeline.bodyText: The PL should be accepting the payload as an Object, correct? So if we pass in a String, does it serialize it again?
timeline.author: abhipsaMisra

timeline.bodyText: why call async client and block on it? why not call the sync client directly - like you had it before?
timeline.author: abhipsaMisra

replies.bodyText: As in my PR description, Just to show how to use the async client, I made one sample use it.
replies.author: vinagesh

replies.bodyText:
In that case, the sample should show how you would call observable APIs and subscribe to them.
I don't think initializing an async client and then blocking on it demonstrates the async client usage properly, right?
replies.author: abhipsaMisra
